Gankutsuou - The Count of Monte Cristo (Fall 2004)

This is a TV-fansub version released by Anime-Kraze in late 2004/early 2005. While the audio and video quality may not be up to "modern standards," imo the subbing here is better than the R1 subs and the releases based on them since Ani-Kraze attempted to preserve the French "feel" of the material.

Source: TV
Video: .avi, 640x360 (eps 1-7) / 704x396 (eps 8-24), 16:9, XviD, ~900 kbps, 23.976 fps
Audio: MP3, Japanese 2.0 Stereo, ~96 kbps
Subtitles: English, 100% hardsubbed.
